setting.location: Private villa garden, peristyle courtyard with fountain
setting.weather: Clear afternoon with warm slanted sunlight creating patterns

characters.appearance: Gaius Petronius, refined man in his forties, intelligent cynical eyes, perfect Roman aristocratic bearing
characters.clothing: Finest white silk tunic with gold thread embroidery, jeweled rings, expensive sandals with silver buckles
characters.position: Reclining on marble bench in his exquisite private gardens, arbiter of taste and beauty
characters.action: Composing his famous suicide letter to Nero, writing with elegant stylus, creating final masterpiece of literary defiance

scene.mainElements: Rectangular courtyard with colonnade, central fountain with water jets, geometric garden beds with herbs and flowers
scene.details: Slanted afternoon light streaming between columns creating alternating bright strips and deep shadows, dust motes dancing in sunbeams, water droplets from fountain catching light like diamonds, shadows of vine leaves creating shifting patterns on marble floor, bronze sundial showing afternoon hour, bees visiting flower beds
scene.background: Painted wall frescoes partially illuminated by angled light, doorways leading to villa rooms in shadow, blue sky visible above colonnade
scene.atmosphere: Peaceful final afternoon of a condemned aesthete, gentle sound of fountain contrasting with approaching death, air scented with roses and approaching doom, contemplative quiet before ultimate act of elegant rebellion against tyranny

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from across courtyard showing figure in dappled light
composition.focus: Reader surrounded by geometric patterns of light and shadow
composition.depth: Foreground fountain with light-catching water, middle ground figure on bench with scroll, background colonnade with deep shadows
